metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13390 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
In FFmpeg 4.1.3, there is a division by zero at adx_write_trailer inlibavformat/rawenc.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13390` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.2.1-2
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.2.1-2
libavcodec-extra58 - 7:4.2.1-2
libavcodec58 - 7:4.2.1-2
libavdevice58 - 7:4.2.1-2
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.2.1-2
libavfilter-extra7 - 7:4.2.1-2
libavfilter7 - 7:4.2.1-2
libavformat58 - 7:4.2.1-2
libavresample4 - 7:4.2.1-2
libavutil56 - 7:4.2.1-2
libpostproc55 - 7:4.2.1-2
libswresample3 - 7:4.2.1-2
libswscale5 - 7:4.2.1-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.2.1-2').
